title: valli naayaka
sahitya:
vallI nAyakA nIvE gatiyani manasAraka namminAnu brOvumu



anupallavi



 talli taNDri guru daivamu nIvani dalaci ninnu santatamu mrokkidi



caraNam



 varamaina nI mahimalanu pogaDi vArikAryamunu vahinturuvani

 nI caraNAlayaminu cakkaga paTTIti SaNmukha harikEshapura vAsamA
